sourcesContent:
<app-face-snap [faceSnap]="mySnap"></app-face-snap>
<app-face-snap [faceSnap]="otherSnap" *ngIf="mySnap.snaps > 5"></app-face-snap>
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { FaceSnap } from './model/face-snap.model';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-root',
  templateUrl: './app.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss']
})
export class AppComponent implements OnInit {

  @Input() mySnap! : FaceSnap;
  @Input() otherSnap! : FaceSnap;

  ngOnInit(): void {
    this.mySnap = {
      title: "Archibald",
      description: "Mon meilleur ami de tout les temps",
      imageUrl: 'https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2015/05/31/16/03/teddy-bear-792273_1280.jpg',
      createdDate: new Date(),
      snaps: 0,
      location: "Paris la montagne"
    }
    this.otherSnap = {
      title: "Sebastien",
      description: "Mon meilleur ami depuis l'enfance",
      imageUrl: 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/08/Three_Rock_Mountain_Southern_Tor.jpg/2880px-Three_Rock_Mountain_Southern_Tor.jpg',
      createdDate: new Date(),
      snaps: 0
    }
  }

}
